Author: Flint#6435
Content: trading volumes are very low last six months and you are talking about some kind of pumps and until we see an increase in trading volumes following an increase in prices, this is not growth, but the speculation is ridiculous to see something in it! There is a constant issue of coins by miners and stakeholders with lack of demand from large investors, as there is currently no REAL use of the coin, so at least until the launch of DEFI on the platform and the KMD credit system with freezing, we will not see any growth and demand and the price will remain wallow close to the bottom!
